summary: Some autohotkey macros to ease playing.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
The game does not have a Fallout 3/FONV like UI that will allow crafting/buying etc in bulk. For ex. with the vanilla UI it takes real long time to smelt hundreds of ores.

I made some macros to ease this process until some alternative is available.

The macros need a program called Autohotkey (http://www.autohotkey.com/download/AutoHotkeyInstall.exe) installed. If you do not want to install it, you can use the exe versions of the macros but they cant be edited unlike text macros.

Usage/Installation:

Method 1: (with installing Autohotkey.exe)
Download Text_Macro_Binds_01-2956-0-1.7z and extract it anywhere. 
Download Autohotkey program from the link above and install.
Run \"skyrim binds.ahk\" 

Method 2: (without installing Autohotkey.exe)
Download Exe_Macro_Binds_01-2956-0-1.exe
Run Exe_Macro_Binds_01-2956-0-1.exe

As long as it is on the task bar pressing H will send E then Y&Enter  keypresses 1000 times per second. And G will do the same for R then Y&Enter

Disabling Macros:
For each macro there will be an icon with an H letter on a green background on the taskbar. Right click it and select \"Exit\"

More macros will be uploaded later. You can easily edit the macro to whatever key combinations or binds you want.

Big thanks to Tristamid for submitting his version of the code.  His version works differently as his setup doesnot have E as activate key!!
author: Ranafuineluva
